feed.title: Carrie Morris
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: Young Womens Housing Project (YWHP)
entry.content:
• Date: June 2016
  • Roles: Branding Illustration, UX, Wireframing, Front-end, Wordpress Development

Young Womens Housing Project approached me to help them refresh their brand identity. I helped them develop their branding to have focus on the amazing support work they do with a new lockup, website and print materials.
entry.summary: Date: June 2016 Roles: Branding Illustration, UX, Wireframing, Front-end, Wordpress Development

entry.title: Children United
entry.content:
• Date: June 2016
  • Roles: Illustration, UX, Wireframing, Front-end

At Yoomee I worked on an agile project for Children United, a collaborative between Save the Children and First News, and Achievement for all. They wanted to help connect a global community of educated children to take collective action in order to change their world.
entry.summary: Date: June 2016 Roles: Illustration, UX, Wireframing, Front-end

entry.title: Healthy Island
entry.content:
Last year I worked on the branding for Young Womens Housing Project who are a charity that offer therapaeutic support and housing for women who are subjects of sexual abuse.

They needed a new identity â€¦
